dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Why Apple Stock Gained 30% Last Year
News Content: Investors are plowing into this popular name in anticipation of its next long-lived growth run.

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.75, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.25
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.3, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: -1, Prediction of stock price falling: -1


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```json
{
  "reasoning": "The news headline indicates strong positive sentiment towards Apple stock, citing a 30% gain last year and investor anticipation of continued growth.  However, the previous predictions are mixed.  Some models show a strong probability of a price rise (0.7-0.75), while others are more pessimistic (0.3-0.4).  The highly negative prediction from qwen/qwen-turbo (-1) is likely an error and should be disregarded.  Considering the positive news and the overall leaning towards a price rise in the previous predictions (excluding the outlier), I'm assigning a higher probability to a price rise, but acknowledging the uncertainty reflected in the varied predictions.  I'm adjusting the probability slightly downward from the most optimistic predictions to account for the dissenting opinions and inherent market volatility.",
  "company_name": "Apple Inc.",
  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
  "news_headline": "Why Apple Stock Gained 30% Last Year",
  "probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.65,
  "probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.35
}
```
